case.title: Horny 20 blonde seeking boys from London - 20 (London)
case.text: Hi, I'm Patty from London blonde. I'm looking for serious guys who know what they want :-) Tell me somethin about yourself and I will do the same. Would like long term discreet relationship? Please be real and intrested in the same thing. I am very serious about this search. I hope to hear from you! Patty :-*
